decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and supporting documents: 1739/04 (Location Plan), 1739/101 (As existing floor plan, sections and elevations), 1739/102 (Block Plan), 1739/103 (Proposed floor plan, sections and elevations - external staircase),  Design and Access Statement
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The roof of the existing outbuilding shall be used solely for maintenance of the sedum roof and beehives. It shall not be used or modified to serve as a balcony, roof terrace, or any other similar amenity area.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of neighbouring properties, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft Local Plan (Regulation 19).
| If the sedum roof and beehives are no longer in use the external staircase shall be removed as soon as reasonably practicable when no longer needed.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of neighbouring properties, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft Local Plan (Regulation 19).
description: Alterations to garage involving installation of external staircase to north east elevation
